thread.title: TV | Downton Abbey

author: Fiona Flynn
title: TV | Downton Abbey
text: There are some pretty distressing scenes in Downton tonight, which you may have already got wind of, but let's just say I wouldn't plan on having your dinner while the Crawley's are. Elsewhere, Andy finds an unexpected confidante while helping Mr Mason move into Yew Tree Farm, Mary is uncertain if she has met her match, Edith meets Bertie Pelham in London, and Spratt comes to Denker's aid. But yeah, there will only be one scene wedged in your mind forever after watching this episode.
